title: How Technology Can Help Close Racial and Gender Gaps at Work
itunes:title: How Technology Can Help Close Racial and Gender Gaps at Work
description:
Katica Roy, CEO at Pipeline Equity, discusses how AI can unlock the economic gains of gender equity.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
